title: What fonts form a great ligature for D & S
content: I was wondering what fonts would form a good ligature for the letters D & S?
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
D and S usually do not connect.  
But if you look at my avatar you can see that it is possible,  
but I don't know a typeface with that ligature.

Dino

Not a font. Just a custom job.

Dino

So basically I need to bridge the letters in order for it to work

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
Or if you follow Dino's examples, find a common stroke.
